summary: To win a school popularity contest, a high school diva permits a film club classmate to record her popular life, but the film starts documenting her decline instead.
cast: Sarah Hyland|Matt Prokop|Sasha Pieterse|Jordan Nichols|Vanessa Morgan|Lili Simmons|David Del Rio|Jimmy Bellinger|Lilli Birdsell|Andrew Airlie|Kacey Rohl|Andrea Brooks|David Milchard|Brenda Crichlow|Erica Van Briel|Kerry James|Nina Kiri|Olivia Ryan Stern|Kathryn Kirkpatrick|Sean Mahaffey|Brent Chapman|Keith Dallas|Aliza Vellani|Ian Brown|Aaron Miko|Taurean Mills|Ianthe Tavernier|Anzor Alem
title: Un chiflado encantador
